description: This restaurant boasts a superb lakeside location, offering views of the opposite shore, Comacina island and Villa Balbianello. The experience is enhanced by the modern cuisine, in which dishes from all over Italy are created by the young chef from Campania, from the opening appetisers to the coffee-paired desserts at the end of the meal. The recipes are sophisticated without being overly complicated, offering a choice of tasting menus or à la carte options. The full flavours of Italian cuisine delight the palate, while the beautiful presentation provides a feast for the eyes.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Maestro', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
